column3: I  have  had  the opportunity of reading  in  draft form, the judgment of His
Lordship Justice A H M D Nawaz.  I  regret my inability to agree with His
Lordship's conclusions and  hence thought it fit to write this judgment.
The Petitioner in  this application  prays from this Court,  following  main
a writ of certiorari to quash the determination  produced  marked  P
a writ of certiorari to quash  the document produced  marked  P 23
a writ of mandamus to compel  the  Respondent to issue an  import
license to the Petitioner as  per his application  produced  marked  P 1

column2: On  the date of the argument, the learned  State Counsel  for the
